content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Phase 1.1: Add boolean parameter helper method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding boolean helper
Phase 1.2: Add string and string_array parameter helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding string helpers
Phase 1.3: Add number and any parameter helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding numeric helpers
Phase 1.4: Add common specific parameter helpers (method, optional_params, strict)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding specific helpers
Phase 2.1: Migrate special tools to use new helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating special tools
Phase 2.2: Migrate BRP extras tools to use new helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating BRP extras
Phase 2.3: Migrate app tools to use new helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating app tools
Phase 2.4: Migrate log tools to use new helpers
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating log tools
Phase 3.1: Update u32/u64 extractors to use generic
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating extractors
Phase 3.2: Add extract_optional_numeric generic function
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding optional generic
Phase 4.1: Add complex parameter combinations (component_mutation_params, query_params)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding combinations
Phase 5: Cleanup - audit and ensure consistent usage everywhere
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after cleanup
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues (no dead_code, no underscore prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If test issues exist, STOP and review with user
Task subagent for final code review
Review subagent's suggestions with user
